# relativeAudioSourceReference

**Instance Property**

The relative audio source to select.

## Declaration

```swift
var relativeAudioSourceReference: INRelativeReference { get }
```

## Discussion

When the user asks for the next or previous audio source, Siri fills this property with an appropriate value. However, if the user asked for a specific audio source, instead of the next or previous one, Siri sets this property to [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INRelativeReference/unknown].

## Getting Details About the Audio Source to Set

- **audioSource**: The audio source to select.
